comment:
* An encapsulation of various parameters for requesting nearby scans.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: SCAN_TYPE_FAST_PAIR
variables.comment: Scan type for scanning devices using fast pair protocol.

variables.name: SCAN_TYPE_NEARBY_PRESENCE
variables.comment: Scan type for scanning devices using nearby presence protocol.

variables.name: SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY
variables.comment: Scan mode uses highest duty cycle.

variables.name: SCAN_MODE_BALANCED
variables.comment:
Scan in balanced power mode.
     *  Scan results are returned at a rate that provides a good trade-off between scan
     *  frequency and power consumption.

variables.name: SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER
variables.comment: Perform scan in low power mode. This is the default scan mode.

variables.name: SCAN_MODE_NO_POWER
variables.comment:
* A special scan mode. Applications using this scan mode will passively listen for other scan
     * results without starting BLE scans themselves.

variables.name: SCAN_MODE_CHRE_ONLY
variables.comment:
* A special scan mode to indicate that client only wants to use CHRE to scan.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to read a ScanRequest from a Parcel.

methods.name: public static String scanModeToString(@ScanMode int scanMode)
methods.comment:
* Convert scan mode to readable string.
     *
     * @param scanMode Integer that may represent a{@link ScanMode}.

methods.name: public static boolean isValidScanType(@ScanType int scanType)
methods.comment: * Returns true if an integer is a defined scan type.

methods.name: public static boolean isValidScanMode(@ScanMode int scanMode)
methods.comment: * Returns true if an integer is a defined scan mode.

methods.name: public int getScanType()
methods.comment: * Returns the scan type for this request.

methods.name: public int getScanMode()
methods.comment: * Returns the scan mode for this request.

methods.name: public boolean isBleEnabled()
methods.comment: * Returns if Bluetooth Low Energy enabled for scanning.

methods.name: public boolean isOffloadOnly()
methods.comment: * Returns if CHRE enabled for scanning.

methods.name: public List<ScanFilter> getScanFilters()
methods.comment: * Returns Scan Filters for this request.

methods.name: public WorkSource getWorkSource()
methods.comment:
* Returns the work source used for power attribution of this request.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: * Returns a string representation of this ScanRequest.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static String scanModeToString(@ScanMode int scanMode)
public static boolean isValidScanType(@ScanType int scanType)
public static boolean isValidScanMode(@ScanMode int scanMode)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
